name: opencode-pty
description: OpenCode plugin for interactive PTY management - run background processes, send input, and read output with regex filtering for advanced terminal control.

installation.summary: Install via npm to enable advanced PTY management and background process control.
installation.markdown:
## Installation

```bash
npm install opencode-pty
```

Add to your OpenCode config:

```json
{
  "plugins": ["opencode-pty"]
}
```

Restart OpenCode to enable PTY management features.
